endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all construction projects and their respective statuses.
Create a new construction project with specified parameters.
Fetch detailed information about a specific project using its unique identifier.
Update specific properties of an existing project.
Retrieve the directory of all workforce members and their assignments.
Assign a workforce member to a specific task within a project.
Fetch current inventory of materials and their availability statuses.
Submit a request for additional materials to be delivered to a project site.
Generate and retrieve the Gantt chart visualization of the specified project plan.
Add a new task to the specified project's schedule.
